column2: Amazon's German workers called out for third day-long strike FRANKFURT
column3: June 3 Workers at Amazon.com's  German operations were set to go on strike on Monday
column4: the third day-long walkout in as many weeks
column5: in a dispute over pay and benefits.

column2: First Facebook president Sean Parker weds in California LOS ANGELES
column4: co-founder of music-sharing website Napster and the first president of Facebook
column5: was married on Saturday in Northern California
column6: a representative for the couple said.
